sourcesContent: import{formatEther as t}from"viem";import{usePrivyInternal as r}from"../hooks/internal-context.mjs";import{getBlockExplorer as e}from"../utils/index.mjs";import"react";import"../hooks/index.mjs";import"../connectors/get-legacy-injected-providers.mjs";import"../connectors/is-wallet-installed.mjs";import"../errors.mjs";import"ofetch";import"../utils/eth/getPublicClient.mjs";let o=new Intl.NumberFormat(void 0,{style:"currency",currency:"USD",maximumFractionDigits:2}),i=t=>o.format(t);const s=(t,r)=>{let e=i(r*parseFloat(t));return"$0.00"!==e?e:"<$0.01"},n=(r,e)=>{let o=i(e*parseFloat(t(r)));return"$0.00"===o?"<$0.01":o},m=(t,r,e=6,o=!1)=>`${c(t,e,o)} ${r}`,c=(r,e=6,o=!1)=>{let i=parseFloat(t(r)).toFixed(e).replace(/0+$/,"").replace(/\.$/,"");return o?i:`${"0"===i?"<0.001":i}`},a=t=>t.reduce(((t,r)=>t+r),0n),l=(t,o)=>{let{chains:i}=r(),s=`https://etherscan.io/address/${o}`,n=`${e(t,i)}/address/${o}`;if(!n)return s;try{new URL(n)}catch{return s}return n};export{l as getBlockExplorerUrlForAddress,s as getDollarsFromStringFloat,n as getDollarsFromWei,m as getNativeCurrencyFromWei,c as parseNativeCurrencyFromWei,a as sumWeiQuantities};
